changeSet.author: arossi
changeSet.comment: record views for consolidated billing and storage info
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW transfer_record AS SELECT CASE WHEN b.p2p=true THEN 'P2P' WHEN b.isnew=true THEN 'WRITE' ELSE 'READ' END AS type, b.datestamp, b.cellname, b.initiator, b.client, d.connectiontime, d.queuedtime, b.transfersize, b.errorcode, b.errormessage, d.mappeduid, d.mappedgid, d.fqan, d.owner, b.pnfsid FROM billinginfo b LEFT OUTER JOIN doorinfo d ON d.transaction = b.initiator AND b.pnfsid = d.pnfsid ORDER BY type, b.datestamp;

CREATE or REPLACE VIEW storage_record AS SELECT CASE WHEN action='restore' THEN 'RESTORE' ELSE 'STORE' END as type, datestamp, cellname, connectiontime, queuedtime, errorcode, errormessage, pnfsid FROM storageinfo ORDER BY type, datestamp;
